law.text: A premium finance company, or an insurance producer, if applicable, may not require an insured or prospective insured to purchase or finance add-on coverage, as defined in § 20-504 of this article, as a condition of financing the premium for an insurance contract issued by the Maryland Automobile Insurance Fund.
